items.title: Amazon SageMaker AI introduces EAGLE based adaptive speculative decoding to accelerate generative AI inference
items.summary: Amazon SageMaker AI's EAGLE-based decoding technique accelerates LLM inference by up to 2.5x while maintaining output quality.
items.notability_reason: The introduction of EAGLE-based adaptive speculative decoding represents a notable advancement in accelerating LLM inference, with substantial improvements in throughput and latency.
